Params: {3: 'The Hetero-Creature collapses to the ground in defiance, its form slowly fading away.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Without so much as a glance at the fallen foe, Vergil flicks Yamato to clear the creature's blood before smoothly sheathing the blade."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "This is the 20th floor. Based on my earlier observations of the Babel Tower's height from a distance, we've now reached the halfway point.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's clear this floor in one go.", 3: '36'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia steps forward and pushes one of the doors open.'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Behind the door lies a vast space, its floor packed with people standing shoulder to shoulder, their bodies crammed together. A rough estimate puts their number at two to three hundred.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noticing the opened door, the crowd recoils in a frantic wave, scrambling backward. Only when their eyes adjust—when they recognize the figures in the doorway—do their cries erupt.'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: 'Are you here to save us?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Their clothes hang in tatters, their faces hollow with hunger and fear, their frail forms betraying days of starvation.'}
{3: 'A refugee offers you an explanation, his body frail and weakened.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee B', 3: "We're residents from conservation areas. Those bats captured us and brought us here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "That man in the white lab coat, no... he's no man. He's a demon!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Once I saw wings growing out of his body!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'He comes here regularly to take people. Drains them dry. Only stops after killing twenty or more...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'And then, he mixes his own blood with the Red Tide. Turns it into those bat things.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Alpha approaches you from the side and speaks in a hushed voice.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "There's a pool formed of the Red Tide inside. It must be where the Mirror Demon breeds those Hetero-Creatures.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: 'No wonder those bats stink like demons.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "They're barely holding on, and most are showing symptoms of Punishing Virus infection from going without serum injections for too long. They need to return to a conservation area for treatment.", 4: '2'}
{2: "But they can't leave on their own...", 3: '96'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: "Should we leave them behind? We can't battle the Mirror Demon while escorting all these people.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The kidnapped residents fall silent, realizing the upcoming conversation will determine their fate.'}
{3: 'Hundreds of pairs of eyes are fixed on you.'}
{1: '1', 3: "A young child, overwhelmed by the heavy silence, lets out a choked sob, only for the mother to swiftly clamp a hand over the child's mouth."}
{2: "Lucia, Lee, and Liv, I'll leave the evacuation to you.", 3: '116'}
{2: 'Dante, Vergil, Alpha, and I will press forward upstairs.', 3: '117'}
{2: 'Against demons, Dante and Vergil are indispensable.', 3: '120'}
{2: "Given the Ascnet's connection, we'll need Alpha too.", 3: '121'}
{2: 'Liv, you need to provide treatment to the evacuees.', 3: '122'}
{2: "Lee and Liv can't keep all the evacuees protected.", 3: '131'}
{2: 'I need you to lead Gray Raven on this mission!', 3: '132'}
{3: 'As everyone turns to leave, Lucia calls out to Alpha.'}
{3: "The girl's gaze fixes on Alpha, unwavering."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Since when did we become this close?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I know what you're going to say. This time, I'll allow it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then I'll leave Commandant in your care.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Satisfied with Alpha's agreement, Lucia turns and walks away."}
{3: "The Hetero-Creatures' assault has been ongoing for some time."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Fann finds Lyca hiding in a corner, and together they head toward the convoy.'}
{2: 'Fann', 3: "Why are you hiding here? I'll take you to the convoy. The captain of the Support Force from Babylonia is looking for you.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'On the way, she sees a young man carrying the elderly woman from last night toward the convoy, the two of them arguing as they go.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Grandma, please... C'mon, we gotta go right now!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elderly Woman', 3: "Put me down! I'm not leaving! What does it matter if these old bones die anyway?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Elderly Woman', 3: 'Let those young folks leave as they want.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "If you stay, I'll stay too!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With those words spoken, the elderly woman finally stops arguing.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Soon after, Fann brings Lyca to Bridget and Max, who are discussing evacuation arrangements.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Some fully-loaded vehicles have already left, and we don't have enough for everyone. That means some of us aren't getting out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "You've got any other vehicles in town?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Everything with wheels is already here. We can't scrounge up any more.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Combat personnel will be last priority. Civilians come first. I'll see who's willing to stay behind.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Despite advance preparations for evacuation, a group of people remains left behind due to the shortage of vehicles.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Seeing Fann's arrival, Max pauses the discussion."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lyca is visibly frightened as she struggles to understand why Fann has brought her here.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noticing her distress, Bridget crouches down and offers a reassuring smile.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'm Bridget, Captain of the Babylonia Support Force. 【kuroname】 asked me to look after you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'These vehicles behind me are our transports. You need to get inside and evacuate with everyone else.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lyca recalls what happened last night, hesitating for a moment before finally speaking up.'}
{2: 'Lyca', 3: 'I think... those Hetero-Creatures are after me. I can...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Lyca can finish, an explosion resounds in the distance.'}
{3: "A transmission from the frontline comes through Max's radio."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Armed Resident', 3: 'They broke through! Some bat monsters got inside!!', 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lyca faintly makes out several Hetero-Creatures flying in from the distant frontline.'}
{3: 'Without hesitation, Bridget snaps her tactical tonfas into position and lunges forward.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'The Hetero-Creatures this time are much stronger!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Faced with numerous enemies, Bridget manages to hold her own against the onslaught, yet struggles to eliminate them quickly.'}
{3: 'Then, a new alarm comes from another part of the frontline. Another wave of Hetero-Creatures has breached the defenses, flooding into the town.'}
{3: 'Buildings crumble like sandcastles under their relentless assault, the tranquil haven of last night now a living hell.'}
{3: 'Lyca watches the scene unfold, her heart twisting with unbearable anguish.'}
{3: 'Before anyone notices, several Hetero-Creatures have crept dangerously close.'}

{3: "Lyca's breath catches as the young man throws himself between his grandmother and the looming threat—but it's still not enough. A Hetero-Creature lunges from a blind spot, pouncing toward the elderly woman in his arms."}
{3: 'She watches as the kind-hearted woman from last night falls to the ground.'}
{3: 'Ill-timed memories suddenly flood her mind, threatening to overtake her focus.'}
{3: 'In a stark white hospital room, the curtains hang motionless as a doctor with an indistinct face delivers regretful news.'}
{3: 'The air reeks of disinfectant and cold metal, pressing in like a weight.'}
{3: 'Beneath the bloodstained white sheet, something lies.'}
{3: 'A trembling hand of a middle-aged person enters her view, fingers twitching toward the fabric, trying to lift away the white covering.'}
{3: 'Lyca lets out a furious roar as a blinding white light erupts around her.'}
{3: 'The entire town suddenly falls eerily silent as all Hetero-Creatures freeze in midair, as if someone had pressed pause on time itself.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But the moment lasts only briefly before the Hetero-Creatures begin to stir restlessly once more.'}
{3: 'Thunder roars as lightning flashes across the sky!'}
{3: "The gleaming edge of the Rev Blade slices through the air, severing the Hetero-Creatures' wings with precision."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'Looks like we came just in time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young man helps the elderly woman to her feet with a warm smile.'}
{3: "Bridget, who's rushing back toward the scene, lets out a sigh of relief at the sight."}
{3: 'In the distance, a transport vehicle slowly comes to a halt as several figures step out.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Bridget, update me on the evacuation status.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'And are you the Lyca mentioned in the reports?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After issuing orders without allowing any objections, Vanessa turns to Lyca, who kneels on the ground, her face etched with exhaustion.'}
{3: 'Recalling the flash of white light from earlier, Vanessa frowns.'}
